headline: Phillips 66 and Kinder Morgan, Inc. Announce Binding Open Season for Western Gateway Pipeline
summary: HOUSTON, October 20, 2025--Phillips 66 and Kinder Morgan, Inc. announced a binding open season for the Western Gateway Pipeline, a proposed refined products pipeline system.

headline: 3 Natural Gas Stocks to Gain From Rising Clean Energy Demand
summary: Rising global clean energy demand and higher gas prices position EQT, KMI and AR to capitalize on expanding natural gas opportunities.

headline: My Boldest Bet Yet: The Power And Infrastructure Boom No One's Ready For
summary: Discover how the AI boom is reshaping U.S. energy, fueling natural gas stocks. Click for my top picks in this sector that is growing in importance.

headline: Can Kinder Morgan’s (KMI) Project Backlog Sustain Long-Term Growth Amid Shifting Energy Demand?
summary: In the past week, Jefferies initiated coverage of Kinder Morgan with a 'Hold' rating, highlighting the company's ability to benefit from rising demand for US natural gas and an anticipated 5% annual growth in adjusted EBITDA through 2030 due to an expanded project backlog and LNG initiatives. This emphasis on Kinder Morgan’s robust balance sheet and growth prospects amid sector headwinds provides new perspective on the company’s long-term energy infrastructure position. We'll explore how...
